page.title: 06EDUCATION: SCHOOL RENOVATION
page.content: The High School has been undergoing a massive renovation and extension, costing around Â£3.5million.The main addition is the centre block,housing the administration,canteen,lecture theatre,sixth-form centre,library, music and careers departments. The school has a very successful sports record,especially in boys hockey winning this year the McCullough,Burney and Ferris Trophies while the Under 15's reached the final of the Richardson Cup.The girls teams are a good average.Other sporting activities include athletics,cricket tennis,table-tennis and soccer.All hockey matches are played on Saturdays under the voluntary supervision of teachers.Travel is by buses run by the Chambers firm of Moneymore.Other games are played during or after school.
